en: Invalid login or password. Please try again.
Please wait while the vocabularies database is being loaded...
The OHDSI Vocabularies database is required to display concept mappings and terminology details. Please configure the vocabularies folder in settings.
Concepts from standard terminologies (SNOMED CT, LOINC, RxNorm, etc.) associated with the selected general concept.
Detailed information of the concept selected in the associated concepts table: vocabulary, domain, class, and links to ATHENA and FHIR resources.
Comments written by domain experts to help understand the concept and perform an appropriate mapping.
Concepts related to the selected concept and its position in the OHDSI vocabularies hierarchy. Double-click a row to see details.
Standardized concepts from the INDICATE data dictionary. Select a concept to map your source data to it.

A DuckDB database is automatically created from ATHENA CSV files for instant loading at startup.

Load additional concept mappings from OHDSI vocabulary relationships. This enriches the dictionary with related concepts from standard vocabularies.
